content: from the pattern description on deb s website my favorite is a pattern i came up with using the raised box stitch which gives the dishcloth a great waffle texture for anyone interested in making it i would like to share the pattern wouldn t several of these along with some of mrs meyers dish soap make a nice christmas gift 6/2010 ~ pattern is now available in french 1 see sidebar at homespun living blog 1 http //homespunliving blogspot com/p/waffle-knit-dishcloth-pattern-en html
